##**VPS Resource Pool – Become a VPS Reseller -  6+ Locations (US, EU, INDIA & RUSSIA) -[HostNamaste](https://www.hostnamaste.com "HostNamaste")**: A Reliable Indian Hosting Company You Can Trust. ## 

> ##**A Few Key Features of Our VPS Resource Pool:**##

* Powerful Intel Xeon Hardware Processors that Performs
* SolusVM Easy-to-Use VPS Reseller Control Panel (We can make a white-label Reseller Panel for you)
* [A range of 50+ Operating Systems](https://www.hostnamaste.com/clients/knowledgebase/3/What-OpenVZ-OS-Templates-do-you-Provide.html "A range of 50+ Operating Systems")
* Instant Server Setup as soon as Payment has been Passed
* 99.99% Uptime SLA
* RAID-10 Disks
* Tons of IPv4 Addresses Available  
* Tons of IPv6 Addresses Available (In Few Locations)
* Over 4+ Years in Business

* PayPal, Credit/Debit Cards, Alipay, WebMoney, -
* -Payoneer, Wallets and other [Payment Methods](https://www.hostnamaste.com/clients/knowledgebase/6/Payments-We-Accept.html "Payment Methods")
* 24/7/365 Live Chat and HelpDesk Support

> ##**Special LET VPS Resource Pool Offer:**##

##**3x VPS Resource Pool**##

* 2GB RAM

* **$6.99/month (Use Coupon Code: 699ResourcePool)**
